long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My waterapp that help you to drink water on time and be
healthy and fit. Water Time Tracker is a sample consipte help you to be hydration tracker by give you reminder in Water Time Tracker throw out day . Water bottle time is an application designed to promote healthy drinking habits to maintain your body's water balance.


- Features:
- Customizable daily water goals
- Real-time progress monitoring
- Percentage-based completion tracking
- Total water consumption history
- sample app to track your water intake
- Scheduled hydration reminders every 2 hours
- easy user interface no extra complicated steps
- Interactive animation showing water level
- Share app with your friends and family
